body:
Win 32 bit Dumps 0.35.3 : 
- http://goo.gl/wh4Dpg
- http://goo.gl/BR0WZi
- http://goo.gl/mASM3F
- http://goo.gl/iXgvT8
- http://goo.gl/YM7hFK

Mac 64 bit - http://goo.gl/aXV5b7

Thanks.

@kamesh-a All the dump files of Windows are exactly the same with https://github.com/atom/electron/issues/2409#issuecomment-151028053, and one of them is actually from 0.34.3.

You probably want to try to upgrade to 0.36.0, since the crash you saw might have been fixed in Chrome 47.

The dump file of OS X is a bit different though:

```
Operating system: Mac OS X  
                  10.11.1 15B42  
CPU: amd64
     family 6 model 58 stepping 9
     4 CPUs

Crash reason:  EXC_BAD_ACCESS / KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS  
Crash address: 0x7ff300001048  
Process uptime: 33140 seconds  

Thread 13 (crashed)

    Found by: previous frame's frame pointer
```

Thanks @zcbenz we really appreciate your quick response and electron developers for all the awesome works on this environment. I will upgrade the app 0.36.1 and see how it does. 

Have a good day !!!
